description:
Nakaido Hirosuke  is the male protagonist of the story. He lives together with http://anidb.net/ch26430 [his mother] and http://anidb.net/ch26438 [his grandmother]; his father was a film actor.
At the beginning of this story Hirosuke meets a http://anidb.net/ch26380 [beautiful girl] at the train station. He falls in love at first sight but is mistaken for a molester by her.
name: Nakaido Hirosuke
